t: Amazon beats Apple and Google to become the world's most valuable brand
s: June 11, 2019 - Apple comes second, valued at $309.5 billion, with Google in third place, at $309 billion, according to the BrandZ Top 100 Most Valuable Global Brand ranking 2019, compiled by WPP research agency Kantar and released Tuesday.

Kantar study: Amazon passes Apple, Google as world's most valuable brand - UPI.com
s: June 11, 2019 - Retail giant Amazon surpassed Google Tuesday as the world's most valuable brand -- with a total value of $315.5 billion, an increase of more than $100 million in the past year, a research group said in a new study.

t: Amazon Overtakes Google and Apple As World's Most Valuable Brand - Business Insider
s: June 14, 2019 - According to BrandZ's 2019 ranking, Amazon is the world's most valuable brand and is now worth $315.5 billion.

t: Amazon dethrones Google as top global brand: survey
s: June 11, 2019 - The brand value of Amazon surged by 52 percent to $315 billion, global market research agency Kantar said in its 2019 100 Top BrandZ report · US retail giant Amazon has moved past hi-tech titans Apple and Google to become the world's most valuable brand, a key survey showed Tuesday.

t: Amazon beats Apple and Google to be named most valuable brand | Cult of Mac
s: June 11, 2019 - Kantar’s BrandZ list ranked the following companies in its top 10: Amazon $315.5 billion Apple $309.5 billion Google $309 billion Microsoft $251.2 billion Visa $177.9 billion Facebook $159 billion Alibaba $131.2 billion Tencent $130.9 billion McDonald’s $130.4 billion AT&T $108.4 billion
